title: Why a presidential censure would be more historic than you think
description: Carrie Dann looks at the story of the one and only presidential censure, a rebuke of President Andrew Jackson which was quickly removed by Jackson's supporters.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
